Package gui

Class ShowBorrowedBooksController

java.lang.Object
gui.ShowBorrowedBooksController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IController
public class ShowBorrowedBooksController extends Object implements IController
Controller class for managing the borrowed books UI. This class handles the display and functionality related to borrowed books, such as extending loan durations and viewing details.

    • initializeBorrowedBooks

      public void initializeBorrowedBooks()
      Initializes the borrowed books TableView and fetches data from the server.

    • SelectRow

      private void SelectRow(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event) throws Exception
      Handles the selection of a row in the TableView. Enables or disables the "Extend" button based on the selected book's extendability.
      Parameters:
      event - MouseEvent triggered by row selection.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs while processing the selection.

    • Extend

      private void Extend(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action of extending the loan period for the selected book. Sends a request to the server and displays the result.
      Parameters:
      event - ActionEvent triggered by clicking the "Extend" button.

    • start

      public void start(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage) throws Exception
      Starts the UI for displaying borrowed books.
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - The primary stage for the application.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs while loading the UI.

    • RefreshBorrowedBooks

      private void RefreshBorrowedBooks()
      Refreshes the data in the TableView by fetching the latest borrowed books from the server.
